# Changes in 2.13.1

- Add planet count and fleet size information to stellaris savegames
- Add support for Hoi4ToVic3 and Eu4ToVic3 converters
- Auto-detect converter installation directories on startup
- Cache ck3 coat of arms to increase performance
- Improve accessibility descriptions of the user interface
- Correlate Stellaris campaigns across sessions
- Fix Stellaris savegame errors
- Fix various other small bugs
